required libraries

- [aws](https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-php)
- [ckeditor](https://github.com/ckeditor/ckeditor4)
- [googlemaps](https://github.com/googlemaps/v3-utility-library)
- [locationpicker](https://github.com/Logicify/jquery-locationpicker-plugin)
- [masonry](https://github.com/desandro/masonry)
